author: Reuters Editorial
title: PM Johnson's message to UK after testing positive for coronavirus
description: British Prime Minister said on Friday he had tested positive for coronavirus and was self-isolating at his Downing Street home.
content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister said on Friday he had tested positive for coronavirus and was self-isolating at his Downing Street home. 
Here is full text of a video message he posted on Twitter: 
“Hi Folks 
“I want to bring you up to speed on s… [+1849 chars]
